titleStmt.title: The vvitts A comedie, presented at the private house in Blacke Fryers, by his Majesties servants. The author VVilliam D'avenant, servant to Her Majestie.
titleStmt.author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Augustine Mathewes] for Richard Meighen, next to the Middle Temple in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: A1 is a license to print. Variant: A1 is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
